main event: Several lights resembling a meteor were observed over Trent, Texas, on 10 August 1958.
interesting points: The sighting involved a long streak of light followed by a bright burst., The object displayed vertical motion before bursting and fading away., The observation lasted for several seconds., The phenomenon was concluded to be a bolide., No other activities were noted in the area during the sighting.
sighted object: a bright light with a meteor-like trail
